featured.text: Some umbrellas fold up, 20 it is easy to carry them.
The brain of a chimpanzee has the same internal structure and on its surface the same pattern of folds as the human brain, which, however, is three times as large.
When not in use, the hinges allowed the two pieces of wood to fold back up tightly against the cabinet, where they were held in place by magnets.

definition.en_def: To bend something over upon itself.
definition.example: Please fold the paper in half.
